title: Senior Data Scientist
text:
Hello! I’m Henrique Schall, a Senior Data Science , where I leverage artificial intelligence to combat financial crimes and develop credit risk strategies. With over seven years of experience in the field, I’ve had the opportunity to work across various organizations, ranging from

Deep Learning: Perceptron, MLP, CNN, RNN, Transformers, Autoencoders, GANs, GNN.
